text: Beluga caviar is the caviar of the beluga sturgeon. The most expensive caviar ever, it has been banned from most countries in the world due to the sturgeon being close to extinction. It can cost around $7,000 to $22,000. == References == # "What is Beluga Caviar and why is it so expensive?". # "Inside America's Only Beluga Caviar Farm". # "Most expensive caviar". Guinness World Records. # "Beluga Caviar". Food Fancy. September 2012. Category:Acipenseriformes
title: Beluga caviar
